alert.note: Alert for Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:57AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kankakee County through 515 AM CDT... At 457 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Limestone, or near Bourbonnais, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kankakee, Bourbonnais and Bradley around 510 AM CDT. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 307 and 308, and between mile markers 316 and 320. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
